video.title: DTLA
video.synopsis: A diverse group of friends -- gay, straight, mostly gay -- experience hookups and heartbreak in their vibrant downtown Los Angeles community.

episodes.synopsis: Lenny throws his partner, Bryan, a birthday party. / Lenny and Bryan want to sell their loft, though a new problem may impede them from doing so.
episodes.title: Episode 1/ Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Bryan enlists the friends to help him and Lenny with their loft. SJ and Norm confront one another. Bryan's mysterious job interviews become a point of contention with Lenny. Matthew gets word on the play.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Lenny seeks advice from his therapist, Dr. Carol. SJ and Kevin, her former college boyfriend up meet for lunch. Kai turns to Rafi for help with a school matter. Stefan attends a dinner party at Trey's house.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Lenny finds unexpected support from a unique set of neighbours. Bryan reaches out to Carla, one of his two moms, for advice. Trey performs at a club.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Lenny and SJ meet and share advice. SJ and Norm have a night out on the town. Rafi helps Kai pass a test. Stefan lands a new client. Matthew becomes suspicious of Marky.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Lenny arranges a meeting for Stefan at his law firm. SJ agrees to help Kevin with his new endeavour. Kai finds himself in a surprise parent teacher conference.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Lenny has an impromptu get together with his father. Lenny and Bryan have a huge party at their loft. Norm shares his feelings with SJ.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Matthew's play opens and the evening is filled with surprises for each one of our friends.
episodes.title: Episode 9
